UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Purification and characterization of Hb 98-114: a novel hemoglobin-derived antimicrobial peptide from the midgut of Rhipicephalus (Boophilus) microplus.
Literature.Author: Belmonte R, Cruz CE, Pires JR, Daffre S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida parapsilosis IOC 4564(MIC=12.5µM),Candida tropicalis IOC 4560(MIC=2.1µM),Candida albicans MDM8(MIC=2.1µM),Cryptococcus neoformans var. grubii H99(MIC=1.6µM),Saccharomyces cerevisiae ATCC 2601(MIC=3.1µM),Aspergillus niger A296(MIC=12.5µM),Aspergillus flavus(MIC=50µM),Aspergillus fumigatus NCPF 2109(MIC=6.3µM),Bacillus megaterium ATCC 10778(no activity data),Micrococcus luteus(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(no activity data),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(no activity data),Enterobacter cloacae K12(no activity data),Escherichia coli SBS 363(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 14502(no activity data),Serratia marcescens CDC 2124(no activity data)
